item.title: Remediating BitLocker DMA Exception Errors with Microsoft Intune
item.description: Silently encrypting Windows 10 and later devices in Microsoft Intune isn’t anything new, removing reliance on Administrator permissions to encrypt a device during either Windows Autopilot or otherwise, as long as your configuration meets the pre-requisites and you’re only using a TPM (Trusted Platform Module) as a pre-boot authentication method.
